results.title: Endoscopic Spine Surgery - Dr Sridhar Spine
results.snippet: What is Endoscopic Spine Surgery ? Endoscopic spine surgery is a minimally invasive procedure used to treat various spinal conditions, such as herniated discs, sciatica, spinal stenosis, and degenerative disc disease. The procedure is performed using a small incision, an endoscope (a tiny camera), and specialized surgical instruments to treat the affected area with precision.

results.title: Endoscopic Spine Surgery in Hyderabad - Dr. Suresh Cheekatla
results.snippet: What is Endoscopic Spine Surgery ? Endoscopic spine surgery in hyderabad is a minimally invasive surgical technique that utilizes specialized instruments and advanced imaging technology to treat spinal conditions. Unlike traditional open surgery , this procedure involves smaller incisions, minimal tissue disruption, and faster recovery times.
